sign-in.legal.tos_prefix: By creating an account, you agree to our
sign-in.hero.subtitle: Chat with specialized expertise - Experience AI with complete data protection with us
sign-in.password.reset.title: Reset your password
sign-in.hero.title: Unlock the power of your private mental health AI
sign-in.create.error.password_too_short: Password is too short. Please use at least 12 characters.
sign-in.create.error.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
sign-in.create.error.technical: A technical error occurred while creating the account.
sign-in.create.error.email_already_regis: This email address is already registered. Please sign in or use a different address.
sign-in.create.error.password_too_weak: Password is too weak. Please use a stronger password.
sign-in.create.success.title: Account successfully created.
sign-in.create.success.body: You can now set up your personal passkey - the most secure login method available.
sign-in.intro.sign_in: Sign in with your email and password. If you’ve already set up a passkey, you log in using your smartphone and FaceID or TouchID.
sign-in.intro.create: Create your account with email and password. Afterwards, you set up a secure passkey on your smartphone using FaceID or TouchID.
passkey.hero.title: Set up your secure smartphone passkey
passkey.hero.subtitle: Use your smartphone with FaceID or TouchID as your secure key to sign in to mentalhealthGPT.
passkey.setup.title: Set up your passkey on your smartphone
passkey.setup.body: Scan the QR code with your smartphone to create a secure passkey using FaceID or TouchID. This will be your primary login method.
passkey.setup.button_start: Generate QR code for passkey setup
passkey.setup.qr.title: Scan the QR code with your smartphone
passkey.setup.qr.body: Open your smartphone camera or your password manager and scan the QR code to start the passkey setup.
passkey.setup.qr.hint: If nothing happens, try scanning the code again or open the link with your smartphone directly.
passkey.setup.status.waiting: Waiting for confirmation from your smartphone…
passkey.setup.error.generic: Could not start your passkey setup. Please try again.
passkey.setup.error.timeout: The passkey setup took too long. Please start again.
passkey.setup.success.complete: Your passkey has been created successfully. You will be redirected to the sign-in page.
passkey.setup.back_to_signin.prefix: You can also return to the sign-in page at any time:
passkey.mobile.title: Set up your passkey
passkey.mobile.success: Your passkey has been created successfully.
passkey.mobile.success_close_window: You can now close this window.
passkey.mobile.status.awaiting_biometric: Please confirm with Face ID, Touch ID, or your device passcode.
passkey.mobile.error.options_failed: We could not start the passkey setup. Please try again.
passkey.mobile.error.invalid_or_expired: This registration link is no longer valid. Please scan a new QR code.
passkey.mobile.error.timeout_options: The request timed out while loading secure registration data. Please try again.
passkey.mobile.error.registration_failed: Passkey creation was interrupted or failed. Please try again.
passkey.mobile.error.timeout_verify: The request timed out while verifying your passkey. Please try again.
passkey.mobile.error.verify_failed: We could not verify your passkey. Please try again.
passkey.mobile.error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
passkey.signin.title: Please sign in with your passkey
passkey.signin.body: Scan the QR code with your smartphone to sign in securely using Face ID or Touch ID.
passkey.signin.qr.title: Scan this QR code
passkey.signin.qr.body: Open your camera on your smartphone and scan the code to continue.
passkey.signin.qr.hint: Keep this page open while you complete Face ID or Touch ID on your phone.
passkey.signin.error.timeout: The QR code has expired. Please start again.
passkey.signin.error.verify_failed: We couldn’t verify the passkey on this device. Please try it again.
passkey.signin.back_to_signin.prefix: Want to use email and password instead?
passkey.signin.status.waiting: Confirm on your phone to continue.
passkey.mobile.login.title: Sign in with the passkey
passkey.mobile.login.error.invalid_or_ex: This sign-in link is no longer valid. Please scan a new QR code.
passkey.mobile.login.error.timeout_optio: The request timed out while loading secure sign-in data. Please try again.
passkey.mobile.login.error.verify_failed: We couldn’t verify your passkey. Please try again.
passkey.mobile.login.error.timeout_verif: The request timed out while verifying your sign-in. Please try it again.
passkey.mobile.login.success: You are now signed in successfully.
